
# Links

- **Join our Telegram group - https://t.me/whatsbombapp**



## Features

- Sending Message to a Contact continously 
- You can prank your friends 
- In this we have 520 animals name
- Install and Use
- It has graphical interface 

## Usage

```py
import pywhatsbomb
pywhatsbomb.bomb("start")


```

![image](https://telegra.ph/file/da446c81e4e0cf62f5d81.png)
The required image will get download when you run program first time...

![image](https://telegra.ph/file/6a1d04e7b4e04332661ef.png)
Now you can start to use......
